txt.en: Destroyed cold-drake eggs at Kêr Bréin ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Within the ruined walls of Kêr Bréin, the cold-drakes of the Frost-horde have laid a new clutch of eggs.
'That will show the Frost-horde, [placeholder]! Let us report your success to Hórin!'
Your mission is to destroy cold-drake eggs at Kêr Bréin.
Destroy cold-drake eggs at Kêr Bréin ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
